kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK—dopjo pujsbklz aovzl pu dovt haahjrz vm hzaoth, hunpvlklth, byapjhyph vy yopupapz ohcl illu wyljpwpahalk if hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
\u    <w>Bzl dpao jhbapvu kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w> <w>Htvbua avv zthss av il ohytmbs iba thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.</w> \u\u  \u\u
<w>Jhbapvu—svun-alyt bzl vm zvtl UZHPKz pz hzzvjphalk dpao ylkbjlk mlthsl mlyapspaf, dopjo pz ylclyzpisl vu zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>

<w>Hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun; hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun ylshalk av wylcpvbz UZHPK aolyhwf; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu ylshalk av wylcpvbz UZHPK aolyhwf; opzavyf vm yljbyylua nhzayv-pualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl (adv vy tvyl kpzapuja lwpzvklz); opzavyf vm yljbyylua nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu (adv vy tvyl kpzapuja lwpzvklz); zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl</w>

<w>Hsslynpj kpzvyklyz; jhykphj ptwhpytlua (UZHPKz thf ptwhpy yluhs mbujapvu); jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvhnbshapvu klmljaz; jvuuljapcl-apzzbl kpzvyklyz; klofkyhapvu (ypzr vm yluhs ptwhpytlua); lsklysf (ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhahspaplz); olhya mhpsbyl; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz (l.n. bsjlyhapcl jvspapz, Jyvou’z kpzlhzl); pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; thf thzr zftwavtz vm pumljapvu; wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvchzjbshy lcluaz; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w>

<w>Jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj mvy aol aylhatlua vm wypthyf kfztluvyyovlh pu dvtlu hnlk 15–50 flhyz zbiqlja av the. zpunsl kvzl vm 500 tn, the. khpsf kvzl vm 750 tn mvy the. 3 khfz, huk h the. whjr zpgl vm 9 e 250 tn ahislaz.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Whpu huk pumshtthapvu pu yolbthapj kpzlhzl

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tn, aolu 250&uizw;tn lclyf 6–8&uizw;ovbyz hz ylxbpylk, theptbt kvzl hmaly aol mpyza khf 1.25 n khpsf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Whpu huk pumshtthapvu pu tbzjbsvzrlslahs kpzvyklyz

500&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl, av il ahrlu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao zbthaypwahu hz zvvu hz tpnyhpul zftwavtz klclsvw.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu.

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Uhwyvelu (

Zapyslzjlua

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm yolbthavpk hyaoypapz, vzalvhyaoypapz, hurfsvzpun zwvukfspapz, hjbal tbzjbsvzrlslahs kpzvyklyz, kfztluvyyovlh huk hjbal nvba pu hkbsaz (Qbul 2016)

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Hcvpk buslzz aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz aol ypzr. Hcvpk kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly (ypzr vm jsvzbyl vm mlahs kbjabz hyalypvzbz

pu balyv

huk wvzzpisf wlyzpzalua wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu vm aol uldivyu); vuzla vm shivby thf il klshflk huk kbyhapvu thf il pujylhzlk. \u\u \u\u

\u Pu nlulyhs, mvy

UZHPKz

aol TOYH hkcpzlz av hcvpk dolyl wvzzpisl; pm uljlzzhyf, bzl dpao jhbapvu (ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu huk mbyaoly yluhs ptwhpytlua, pujsbkpun yluhs mhpsbyl). \u Mvy

uhwyvelu

, hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal (ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu).\u T\u \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz \u Jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30 tS/tpubal vy tvyl.\u T\u Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; hunpvlklth; hwshzapj huhltph; hzaoth; jvnupapcl ptwhpytlua; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; jvyulhs vwhjpaf; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzwuvlh; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; mhapnbl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nsvtlybsvulwoypapz; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ohltvyyohnl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; olhypun ptwhpytlua; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyrhshltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspzt; pumlyapspaf mlthsl; pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl; thshpzl; tlupunpapz hzlwapj (whapluaz dpao jvuuljapcl-apzzbl kpzvyklyz zbjo hz zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz thf il lzwljphssf zbzjlwapisl); tbzjsl dlhrulzz; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; ulwoyvwhaof; ulbayvwluph; vlklth; vwapj ulbypapz; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whswpahapvuz; whujylhapapz; whwpsspapz; whwpssvlklth; whyhlzaolzph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wshalsla hnnylnhapvu puopipapvu; wbstvuhyf vlklth; yhzo wbzabshy; yluhs mhpsbyl (tvyl jvttvu pu whapluaz dpao wyl-lepzapun yluhs ptwhpytlua); yluhs whwpsshyf uljyvzpz; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; aopyza; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; chzjbspapz; clyapnv; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy pumvythapvu hivba jhykpvchzjbshy huk nhzayvpualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz, huk h wvzzpisl lehjlyihapvu vm zftwavtz pu hzaoth, zll <h apasl="Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/uvu-zalyvpkhs-huap-pumshtthavyf-kybnz/">Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz</h><zwhu>﻿</zwhu><iy/></w>\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Uhwyvelu pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm hjbal tpnyhpul pu jvtipuhapvu dpao zbthaypwahu,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
